widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (45, 0), size = (65, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115, 0), size = (130, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (250, 0), size = (300, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (630, 4), size = (20, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (45, 0), size = (65, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115, 0), size = (130, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (250, 0), size = (300, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (630, 4), size = (20, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 16)], "itemHeight": 30 }
